The picture is great, the sound is nice, and I could probably rave about the features if I knew how to get the most out of them.

Reviews.Title: wonderful tv
Reviews.Author: cynthia diehl
Reviews.Content: I love the high def and going from a 19 inch tv to a flat screen tv is simply beyond description.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: Joe M.
Reviews.Content: Great picture with excellent sound.  Easy set-up.  I'm satisfied with this purchase.  The only negative I can muster (and it's minor) is there are only 2 HDMI inputs.  3 would have been great.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LED TV
Reviews.Author: Maggie
Reviews.Content: We were looking for something clearer and larger than the tv we have; this was just what we needed.It was easily set up and programmed with our Directv programming.I would definitely recommend this tv.

Reviews.Title: Everything I expected
Reviews.Author: DocSalvage
Reviews.Content: And being "everything I expected" is a resounding endorsement these days. This unit has all the expected inputs including 2 HDMI inputs as well as on-screen options for adjusting everything adjustable to suit your personal tastes. Have only been running it for about a month so can't speak to reliability yet. There have been no problems so far.

Reviews.Title: Good Deal
Reviews.Author: Scot Abraham
Reviews.Content: This is a Great TV for the price in my opinion. Not the best for some sports for some people, the refresh rate (60hz) is low and is lacking a little when watching football during the actual play (gives the impression to me that it is going in and out of focus a little), but it doesn't bother me, but that's me. Free shipping and tax free I couldn't go wrong. I really have come to like Samsung's picture quality over the last 9 years or so. This model is nothing spectacular, but a solid set and a sold deal on sale if you don't want to spend a lot of dough. If you are not happy with this TV you were expecting too much for what you paid In my opinion. Happy New Year!

Reviews.Title: Great picture!
Reviews.Author: KC
Reviews.Content: .We bought this TV after buying a 51" Samsung a few months ago.  We've been very happy with the picture and features of both. Our son is  now buying one too..

Reviews.Title: Decent TV for the money
Reviews.Author: Sergey Barskiy "Sergey"
Reviews.Content: Decent TV, works fine as the TV for game console.  Decent resolution at a fair price.  Not much more to say.

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: Paul
Reviews.Content: Super value for the cost. Clear, sharp picture. Nice sound. It's a TV - what more can I say, huh?

Reviews.Title: Great T.V
Reviews.Author: Renee Stoodt
Reviews.Content: Perfect size, perfect picture. Great tv without having a 3D tv. I love the tv. I was surprised how safe my tv was being shipped and not bought at a store.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Flat screen
Reviews.Author: Charles rothe
Reviews.Content: Everything worked as it was supposed to work. From the Order through the delivery through the setup. Finally the quality of the TV was what I expected

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: G. Simon
Reviews.Content: This TV is light as a feather, and the picture looks great. Very happy, especially for the price. The bezel is very small.

Reviews.Title: Best pick for our family home.
Reviews.Author: zenmaster43
Reviews.Content: Excellent!!! We have a home entertainment center with a 35.5" wide opening and this TV fit to within 1/8" clearance on both sides. Brilliance and contrast are superb. The connectivity is great and the menus easy to use. The perfect match for our home.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Electronics UN39FH5000 39-Inch 1080p 60Hz LED TV
Reviews.Author: Hunter McQueen
Reviews.Content: A great buy. Superb picture quality. The sound is very good as well.Easy to setup.This replaced my 32'' Vizio 720p lcd tv that was about 4-5 years old.I am very happy with this tv so far.I selected the Free super saver shipping...Ordered it on 9/16/13... they shipped it on 9/20/13.. it was in my town on 9/21/13... but upsdidn't delivery on Sat, or Sun. TV received on 9/23/13.My town is not very far from one of their shipping warehouses.. so I expected to get it sooner, but the people at Amazon took their sweet time on delivering it to UPS. But hey no big deal.

Reviews.Title: Really glad I upgraded to this tv!
Reviews.Author: Mukti and Dharma
Reviews.Content: The first 39 " Samsung arrived with a hole in the box that I did not see until repacking the TV to return to sender. The tv was DOA due to a hole in the screen.  Why they do not package the TV's with foam in front of the screen seems like a no brainer to me, but alas, I am not in charge of the packaging process. The exchange process was incredibly easy. I repacked the dysfunctional tv and it was picked up the following day.  Meanwhile, Amazon had already sent a replacement tv which arrived on Monday rather than on Saturday.  The delay was slightly annoying but really, I had a functional tv, it was just smaller.  I unpacked this tv and fully expected the process to be easy as that was what the reviews led me to believe.  The start up screen is straightforward and I am now enjoying my new tv.  The sound is much better than on my previous tv which was a Vizio, so although some people reviewing says the sound is not all it could be, I am a happy camper.  The picture is wonderful and I have nothing but positive comments about this purchase.

Reviews.Title: My fourth Samsung TV
Reviews.Author: Jim N
Reviews.Content: This TV gives me the size and quality I wanted in my bedroom viewing.  I found no reason to change brands whe I have been so pleases with any Samsung flat screen TV I have owned.

Reviews.Title: Can count on Samsung
Reviews.Author: Maryellen Fitzsimmons
Reviews.Content: Great TV and great price!  39 inch just the right size for my bedroom.  Can't wait to watch baseball in HD!

Reviews.Title: Great TV, especially for the price.
Reviews.Author: JK
Reviews.Content: Great TV for the price.  I was originally looking at the 40" but couldn't pass up the savings for the 39".  First TV was delivered completely smashed to pieces but Anazon replaced with another, next day courrier.  The packaging could have been better but thankfully the next one arrived unharmed.

Reviews.Title: Works well once adjusted properly
Reviews.Author: Robert Conard
Reviews.Content: The out-of-the-box video settings were a bad fit for our situation (connected to a Mac Mini streaming Hulu, Netflix and over-the-air tv via Egalto USB).  A search here in the Amazon reviews yielded some good advice and guidelines from other users for color, contrast, brightness, etc.  A little additional tweaking gave us a picture quality that works well for movies, tv and desktop computing.  Audio quality is acceptable - something that also required a little adjustment.  This is a very nice tv for the price.  A non-DIY type of person may want to find some help making everything right for their use.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic pictures and color
Reviews.Author: Julio
Reviews.Content: A salesperson at Costco Alhambra recommended my wife and I to consider SAMSUNG brand LED TV but we decided to purchase from amazon.com because price is lower.  After approximately a month of viewing, we are quite happy with the decision we made, picture and color are clear.  We will reserve our final conclusion after at least 3 months later.

Reviews.Title: Bought this for my PS4
Reviews.Author: Jimmy
Reviews.Content: I found this TV and after some research I found that this TV was the best bang for my buck. it only has 2 HDMI ports but that's not a problem for me because I found a cheap HDMI switcher for only 10 dollars here on amazon so now I have 6 HDMI ports. Instead of buying a smart TV for their apps I just bought a cheap 25 ft. HDMI cable also off of amazon so I could wired it along the edges of my room to reach my laptop on my desk. I use it as a second screen and its great when I want to watch movies with my girlfriend. The sound is pretty standard, the bass is not very deep but it can get pretty loud without ruining the audio quality. I just plugged in my computer speakers to my TV since it has a 3.5 audio port and it works like a charm. This is a great TV for anyone who wants crisp 1080p for cheap and there are plenty of cheap ways to get the most out of the TV (add HDMI ports, connect to computer to get more that what a smart tv has to offer, and the ability to plug in speakers.)

Reviews.Title: Excellent bedroom size TV if you want excellent picture and don't need smart features.
Reviews.Author: Skitty
Reviews.Content: We have bought 7 HD TVs for our two homes in the last few years.  This was meant to be an inexpensive bedroom TV and it surprised us with a picture pretty much as good as our most expensive TVs.  I had to do a little tweaking of the settings to get the picture to my liking but it is crisp, has good control over black and dark areas and pretty decent sound with a separate bass speaker. It is limited to two HDMI inputs plus analog and is "stupid".  This doesn't matter for our purpose and if we want to smarten it up an inexpensive blu ray or Roku will solve that.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 39 TV
Reviews.Author: Robert Snyder
Reviews.Content: Works as expected not long term review. should have more hdmi ports and easier access to specs. no further review.

Reviews.Title: Video & Audio Center couldn't have done a better job.....
Reviews.Author: Clem Smegma
Reviews.Content: This TV is simply incredible!  Would be buyers - find the review the guy posted where he gives you the actual settings to adjust this TV to, after he used some $260 machine to professionally calibrate the settings.  I am using his settings and the picture is unsurpassed.  I use it mostly for an extra large computer monitor - set at 1920 x 1080 it is simply amazing! And, I am an ULTRA GEEK, so I am only interested in superb performance.  And this set gives it!  Even the speakers are far better than I expected.  They play loud and clear - something most LED sets do not do, as the reviews will tell you.  Not this set...it cranks!  And, it gives reasonably good bass for an LED TV!  Most are tinny sounding, but this has a great full sound with every frequency, but the lowest octaves (which I don't ever expect from any TV).HERE'S THE BEST PART:I bought mine from Video & Audio Center.  They packed it so superbly I can't even believe it!  1st it was in the factory sealed Samsung box, inside a much larger box.  But, that box was not a regular box...it was double thick! Yes, instead of standard corrugated cardboard, it was double thick everywhere!  Super beefy.  The factory Samsung box was placed inside with about 3-4" of bubble wrap around the ENTIRE factory box!  I bet there was 5" on the bottom!  Literally the whole TV was encased in layers upon layers of bubble wrap.  I've bought bubble wrap before at Office Depot and this had to be about $25 worth if you purchased it there!  Fantastic job of protecting the TV - THANKS LOADS VIDEO & AUDIO CENTER!  I WILL ONLY BUY FROM YOU FROM NOW ON - Packing couldn't have been done more professionally!  This is my 1st LED TV I have ever purchased online and I know where I will be buying all others.

Reviews.Title: Greatest TV EVER
Reviews.Author: Robert C. Matejka "Dodgerbob"
Reviews.Content: This is easily the best TV I have ever seen or listened to. The sound is even more outstanding than the picture quality when compated to other TV's. I use it in the bedroom and do not watch my large screen 2 year old Samsung in the living room at all.Tremendous value for the money.Set up was a little slow in responding to the next step, be patient it will proceed to the next step.Many easily usable control buttons for individual likes in the set up.I puposely purchased this TV because it is not a smart TV, but a dumb one. An excellent decision if you just want to watch TV and do not care about other devices.

Reviews.Title: Our third Samsung television.
Reviews.Author: Sally
Reviews.Content: I researched the Samsung 550 series before ever buying our first Samsung television.  It was number one in Consumer Reports not only in their magazine, but also in their yearly book.  We love all of our Samsung 550 series which according to reviews have had less problems than other series. I bought this television for my father and he is very happy with the picture.  He says it could not be any clearer.  The sound is also good.  The next television that I buy will definitely be a Samsung.

Reviews.Title: great TV
Reviews.Author: Emily
Reviews.Content: It's my second one.  It's a great TV; I will probably buy another one for my upstairs den.  Great TV

Reviews.Title: Only using as a display unit for a webpage...
Reviews.Author: JL
Reviews.Content: But, it works, it's mountable and it's easy to set up. I can't talk about ghosting and all that other fun stuff as it's more or less a static image.The viewing angle is decent as well.

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN39FH5000 39-Inch 1080p 60Hz LED TV
Reviews.Author: Ryan Mcduffie
Reviews.Content: PRO - Nice bang for the buckCON - One dead pixel just off center of screen  Takes time to get color adjusted

Reviews.Title: TV Samsung un39fh5000
Reviews.Author: Paul Swensen
Reviews.Content: The TV arrived a day early works awesome Glad to make the purchase, when buying it the website listed a shipping date of 3 to 7 days.  It was shipped in the 4th day and arrived a day faster because I think it was drop shipped. all in all win win.  the TV was packaged great safe and sound, the box was huge I thought I was getting a 50 or 60 inch. I'm using the TV as a display TV playing off a flash/thumb drive. It plays AVI and several other types of media.

Reviews.Title: Best TV ever!
Reviews.Author: Momcilo Prodanovic
Reviews.Content: Hi guys,In summer I ordered this TV and got better one :-)Instead of 60Hz I got 120Hz TV.Coupled with Google Chromecast, this is just one amazing product.Picture quality is the best I've seen for this money (if you compare it to LG, Insignia or any other brand).Music is also nice. I don't even need external speakers to listen to Pandora.I'm so happy with this purchase and now my friend is buying the same one next week.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: Dannie D Hall
Reviews.Content: Great Gift for my Mother she love it  thank you again. It is a 5 star TV it was new and just geat for her thank you again

Reviews.Title: Need calibration settings for new firmware!!!!
Reviews.Author: javanub
Reviews.Content: I purchased the TV from abt.com based on all the good reviews here and pretty much every where else. But looks like the default settings are not as good as the older 720 p TV I had before. I tried a couple calibration settings - one from the review on this site, and the other from consumer reports. Still I don't see much improvement. Luckily the sound seems to be more than adequate for me.Couple reasons why I might be seeing the issue1. I mostly view over the air channels (NBC, CBS, FOX, PBS etc. - which used to be flawless on the old sammy 720p) - so probably since this is a 1080 p set, I need to somehow change the setting on the TV to say, the source is 1080i or 720p or even 480i in some cases...2. the firmware version has been upgraded compared to what was listed on comsumerreports site. So, I am assuming those calibration settings don't work anymore, and same with the calibration settings from the review on this site...If somebody has updated the firmware for this model and has new calibration settings, please please update here...Or if you have any other suggestions for me please let me know... I can even go for a different model (price range 370- 400)... if you guys think the picture quality for this model is not really that good..

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: todd henry

Reviews.Title: Does NOT output 5.1ch audio using HDMI, Component, or Composite sources!!!
Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: I was once dedicated to Samsung at the complete exclusion of their competitors. However, with one purchase my fidelity to this company has been cast into serious doubt by their non-documentation of a feature-breaking optical out limitation and their complete refusal to acknowledge their mistake or resolve this issue for me.I bought this TV for two reasons: 1080p and the device manual's claims that, "The SPDIF...outputs an uncompressed digital audio signal...to a digital audio in jack on a receiver or home theater," and, "By connecting the TV to a receiver or home theater with Dolby Digital and 5.1ch speakers and selecting Dolby Digital, you can maximize your interactive 3D sound experience."NONE OF THAT IS TRUE!!! Though the above statements are quoted directly from the manual, the device ONLY outputs 2ch PCM over its optical out for HDMI, Component, and Composite sources, regardless of the original input bitstream (5.1 channels of PCM, Dolby, or DTS). This feature-breaking limitation of the device's optical out is NOT disclosed ANYWHERE on Samsung's website specs or manual, and is acknowledged only in a SINGLE troubleshooting document which must be deliberately searched for and is intended to be used by those who have ALREADY purchased the device. And after speaking with Samsung support at length, it appears that MOST or ALL Samsung televisions are affected by this optical out limitation, and NONE of them have it properly documented (on samsung.com or within the minority of manuals I spot checked).I've contacted Samsung multiple times regarding this issue: most of their support agents are not aware of this limitation or have simply blamed me for not setting up my other equipment properly. It's not until 20-30 minutes with a support agent that they finally understand the problem, but are still of no help whatsoever:* I've asked how I was to know of this limitation before purchase: no one can tell me.* I've asked how to identify a replacement Samsung TV without this optical out limitation: no one seems to know how.* I've asked why this issue isn't documented on their site or, more importantly, the device's manual: no one can tell me why.* I've asked what Samsung is willing to do to rectify this issue: no one seems to care.After six hours on the phone with Samsung's tech "support", I sat down and penned a formal letter to Samsung corporate byway of the office of their president. I sent that on Sunday via email, and it's now Friday and I have heard nothing from corporate, not even a confirmation that my letter was received. In fact, I had to call their support services AGAIN just to find out if they had even received my letter.Samsung's support agents have blamed my receiver, my cables, my HDMI devices, even my own competency... they defer the blame to everyone EXCEPT Samsung. And now they don't even see fit to respond in a timely fashion to a formal letter sent to the office of their president. Unless I'm provided a competent and expedient solution by Samsung, my allegiance to the company will be severed permanently.(PLEASE NOTE: In contrast to Samsung, Amazon has been nothing but contrite and apologetic about an issue they didn't even cause, even going so far as to offer me a discount on a replacement device. It seems Samsung's support has a lot to learn from Amazon.)

Reviews.Content: pretty basic LCD TV but nice picture, sound could be better... if you are looking for a brand name TV that is cheap you can't go wrong.

Reviews.Title: Very nice picture quality!
Reviews.Author: Jammer
Reviews.Content: This is a very good tv - what you would expect from Samsung.  Picture quality is very good, sound is very good, and the remote control is very functional.

Reviews.Title: BEWARE stand comes with wrong size screws
Reviews.Author: bassfest
Reviews.Content: The TV itself is great, beautiful picture and sound. The stand however came with screws that were too long, and after assembly the TV was not secure in the stand. I was able to find some very short screws at home and fix the problem, but I found this really annoying. Had I not done my own searching and left the TV as it was, it probably would have eventually fallen from the stand and break after any chance of receiving a refund.

Reviews.Title: Impossible to Use As Store Display When Vertically Mounted
Reviews.Author: J
Reviews.Content: Though store display is one of the features of this model, several design flaws make it impossible to use if you intend to mount the screen vertically on a wall.  1)  The USB and other connection ports are directly in the back of the unit, rather than on the side, so if you want to change out a USB cable or thumb drive (or HDMI cord for the that matter), the entire unit needs to be unmounted from the wall.  Even then, unless you use an ultra-short  USB port, it won't fit when wall mounted.  Even worse, however, the mounting holes for the unit are placed precisely so that when the unit is hung vertically the mounting rails obstruct the power cord plug in and other connection inputs.  Really poorly designed for one of the intended uses.  Finally, the entire unit, feels very cheap with extremely lightweight  plastic that feels like it can easily crack.

Reviews.Title: Mediocre quality
Reviews.Author: Ronald Levy
Reviews.Content: For an HD set, the picture quality is nothing special. There is little difference in watching an HD channel vs. watching the same channel without HD.

Reviews.Title: Very good TV, Poor Customer Service
Reviews.Author: Christopher M Platt
Reviews.Content: I ordered this at a competitive price and the order fulfillment was handled by Electronic Express. The TV arrived with a cracked screen.  While the returns process was not overly burdensome, it did take over two weeks, and more seemingly more effort from me than from Electronic Express. Most galling of all, though, was that the vendor would not honor the same price for a replacement. Never in my life have I ordered, and PAID FOR, something, had to return it because it was defective, and not have the option of getting a replacement for the price I'd already paid.Sorely disappointed. I wound up buying the same model from a brick-and-mortar store at a higher price to avoid further issues.

Reviews.Title: Closed captioning?
Reviews.Author: Michael Chesser
Reviews.Content: Nice TV, but I can't get the closed captioning to work. Have Atlantic Broadband cable with a Motoral cablebox connected thru HDMI.  I think also the Samsung manual (a few pages) is not as lucid as it could be.Well I got closed captioning to work, but I expect it will work all the time, which is OK by me as this TV is for my 86 year old Pa.
